alert.note: Alert for Inland Sussex; Kent (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 4:44PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A line of showers with gusty winds will impact portions of northwestern Sussex, Kent, Talbot, central Queen Anne`s and Caroline Counties through 530 PM EST... At 443 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers with strong gusty winds along a cold front extending from Smyrna to Hope to near Tilghman Island. Movement was east at 35 mph. This line of showers has a history of producing wind gusts near 40 mph across the Baltimore/Washington metro area. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dover, Easton, Talbot, Smyrna, Milford, Denton, Harrington, Camden, Clayton, Federalsburg, Bridgeville, Greensboro, Oakland, Ridgely, Cheswold, Trappe, St. Michaels, Preston, Oxford and Bowers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
